title: Parade Day for Rams, Teams that should go all in, Burrow top QB in AFC? Rodgers staying in GB? Sean McVay future, and Bucs after Brady
itunes:title: Parade Day for Rams, Teams that should go all in, Burrow top QB in AFC? Rodgers staying in GB? Sean McVay future, and Bucs after Brady
description:
In the latest edition of the Good Morning Football Podcast, hosts Kay Adams, Kyle Brandt, Peter Schrager and Super Bowl Champion Shaun O'Hara hear some Super Bowl calls from around the world before discussing what other NFL teams should take the same path as the Rams and go 'all in'. We debate if Joe Burrow should be considered the top AFC QB right now and if Aaron Rodgers should consider an offer to stay in Green Bay. Rams HC Sean McVay hasn't quieted speculation about his future, so the crew asks what's next in LA? What were the gutsiest calls we've seen in Super Bowl history, plus we start to look ahead by asking how the Bucs will move on from Tom Brady.

The Good Morning Football Podcast is part of the NFL Podcast Network.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
